module.name: LCLClasses
module.short: Defines the base class for all LCL TComponents including controls

element.name: TLCLComponent
element.short: TLCLComponent - base class for LCL components

element.name: TLCLComponent.WidgetSetClass
element.short: WidgetSetClass - the set of Widgets to be used by this Component

element.name: TLCLComponent.RemoveAllHandlersOfObject
element.short: RemoveAllHandlersOfObject - method for removing all of an object's handlers: part of a clean-up procedure

element.name: TLCLReferenceComponent
element.short: TLCLReferenceComponent - A base class for all components having a handle

element.name: TLCLReferenceComponent.Handle
element.short: Handle a handle (sort of pointer or reference) allocated by the operating system to this component

element.name: TLCLReferenceComponent.HandleAllocated
element.short: HandleAllocated - if True, a handle (reference) has been allocated to this component

element.name: TLCLReferenceComponent.ReferenceAllocated
element.short: ReferenceAllocated - if True, a handle (reference) has been allocated to this component
